Package sailpoint.integration

Class RestClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • sailpoint.integration.RestClient
  • public class RestClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for sending REST-style requests and parsing responses. Responses are assumed to be JSON strings of the basic data types supported by JsonUtil.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  RestClient.ConnectionProblemException
      Exception indicating a connection exception.
